Name: Dragon Spark
Desc:
After using Evan's direct Attack skills, there's a chance for Mir to execute additional attacks.
Lv. 10 Effect: Can learn the 2nd Job skill, Advanced Dragon Spark.

Desc.Old: After using Evan's direct attack skills, there's a chance of using Mir to perform additional attacks.
Desc.New:
After using Evan's direct Attack skills, there's a chance for Mir to execute additional attacks.
Lv. 10 Effect: Can learn the 2nd Job skill, Advanced Dragon Spark.

H.Old: [Final Attack Typed Skill] Attacks create a 40% chance of casting Dragon Spark with 100% damage.
H.New: [Final Attack Type Skill] A 40% chance of Advanced Dragon Spark that attacks at 100% Damage

h1.New: [Final Attack Type Skill] A 40% chance of Advanced Dragon Spark that attacks at 100% Damage
